#include <stdio.h>
#define ll long long 
ll int dp[10];
ll int dfunc(ll int n)
{
	if(n<10)
		return dp[n];
	else
	{
		return (dp[n%10]+dfunc(n/10))%10;
	}
}
ll int cfunc(ll int n)
{
	if(n%10==0)
		return 45*n/10;
	else
	{
		return (dfunc(n-1)+cfunc(n-1));
	}
}
void solve(void)
{
	ll int i,j,k;
	for(i=0;i<10;i++)
	{
		if(i%2==0)
		{
			dp[i]=(i*2)%10;
		}	
		else
		{
			dp[i]=i;
		}
	}
}
int main()
{
	ll int t,i,j,k;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	solve();
	while(t--)
	{
		ll int a,b;
		scanf("%lld %lld",&a,&b);
		ll int ans=cfunc(b+1)-cfunc(a);
		printf("%lld\n",ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
